property.name: schemaJSON
property.description-key: Designer: Contains the JSON schema that defines the survey. Input: Contains the survey result in a form of key/value pairs.

property.name: mode
property.description-key: Select a mode for the control.

property.name: template
property.description-key: Field containing Template lookup. Applicable only to Form Designer mode.

property.name: survey
property.description-key: Field containing Form lookup. Applicable only to Client Input mode.

property.name: title
property.description-key: Field containing title of the record. Applicable to all modes expect Client Input.

property.name: description
property.description-key: Field containing description of the record. Applicable to all modes expect Client Input.
